name: Zelda: Meadow of Shadows
summary: Meadow of Shadows is a short hack of the Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past made under an 18 hour timer as apart of a challenge between myself, JaredBrian, Letterbomb, and Zarby89. The game features three dungeons and a final gauntlet area. It showcases the abilities of the ZScream editor and acts as a prequel to the upcoming Oracle of Secrets ROM hack.
